Bone marrow biopsy includes the use of a large bone marrow aspiration needle to spot blood diseases such as leukemia and lymphoma. The bone marrow aspiration needle is injected in the pelvic bone to gather bone marrow. As soon as the biopsy is done, the tissue is collected and protected in a analysis histopathology setup. It is then provided to a pathologist for evaluation who examines the tissue microscopically to analyze the cell type, shape, and function to diagnose the issue. Biopsies done by utilizing bone marrow aspiration needle are very important to study the wellness problems and to identify or treat harmful illness such as cancer and tumors. You could locate on the internet reputed suppliers of bone marrow biopsy sets featuring bone marrow tray and biopsy needle. The bone marrow biopsy set features a marrow extraction cannula aimed at making sure a quality specimen by gathering and holding the bone marrow in the needle cannula without using the unpleasant needle deflection method. This increases patient comfort, lowers risk of a lost sample and boosts the quality of the specimen.
